name: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World -: Beatrice's - Steamed Hams
name_original: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World -: Beatrice's - Steamed Hams
description:
Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World -: Beatrice's - Steamed Hams - is a game where you observe Beatrice's adventure in creating a tasty meal for Natsuki Subaru. Unfortunately for Beatrice, things go wrong relatively quick. 

(This isn't a good game. I threw it together in 3 days and couldn't be bothered to continue. It's still funny though so I'm still gonna release it.)
